trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage> event contains a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> collection which contains the warnings sent from the server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>hendelsen inneholder en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>samlingen som inneholder advarsler som er sendt fra serveren.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage> event is generated when a SQL Server message with a severity level of 10 or less occurs.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>hendelse genereres når det oppstår en SQL Server-melding med en alvorsgrad i 10 eller mindre.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av advarsler sendt fra serveren.

trans-unit.source: The collection of warnings sent from the server.
trans-unit.target: Samling av advarsler som er sendt fra serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the full text of the error sent from the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter hele teksten i feil som er sendt fra databasen.

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en tekstbryting for den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A>for først <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full text of the error.
Gets the name of the object that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på objektet som genererte feilen.

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en tekstbryting for den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A>for først <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the object that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på objektet som genererte feilen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en strengrepresentasjon av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage"> </xref> hendelsen.
En streng som representerer den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage"> </xref> hendelsen.
